TextView.android:text: Is Master Plan available for the Area where ITI is located?
Is the approach road towards the ITI properly paved?
Is the entrance road towards the main building paved?
Availability of Sound proof partition between Classrooms, Workshops and IT Lab
Is the entire ITI situated in the same campus (Same Premises)
Does the ITI have a separate Entrance?
Are all the wires and switch boards properly Covered, Secured and Earthed (concealed conduit or on batten)?
Is the entire ITI properly ventilated and lighted?
Check the plot size of the institute and constructed area
BCC is as per prescribed format and also attached herewith
Is the staircase made of RCC and with proper railing?
